title: Uptown 4BR/2Ba house, walk to lake/shops, updated kitch/baths
posting_body: ['This beautiful Craftsman house is just a short walk from the lakes, the Midtown Greenway trail, and everything the Uptown and LynLake business districts have to offer.', ' The historic architecture of houses like this is one of the many draws to the area.', ' The neighbors are fantastic, too!', ' You will be within easy walking distance of all the shops, restaurants, gyms, and parks, then come home to relax and enjoy this comfortable house with a private fenced in patio and garden.', 'The lease date is flexible.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES', '•\t4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms', '•\tSingle family house built in 1910', '•\tUSI Wireless service hookup', '•\tKitchen updated with built in appliances (including dishwasher), granite and butcher block countertops, exposed brick, open floor plan to living/dining rooms', "•\tClassic architecture features original oak woodwork, stained glass, 9' ceilings, wood floors, box beam ceiling in dining room", '•\tLarge living room with row of windows looking into the garden', '•\tBathrooms both updated - one features a classic claw foot tub and shower, the other a walk-in shower and heated towel racks', '•\tFinished third floor perfect for large office or den', '•\tScreened front porch', '•\tPrivate fenced-in patio and garden with fire pit and exterior lighting', '•\tBike shed for easy storage', '•\tLarge windows allow for plenty of sunlight throughout house', '•\tFinished laundry room with wood floor and cupboards', '•\tAmple basement storage space and shelving', 'NEARBY', '•\tTwo blocks to grocery store', '•\tTwo blocks to Midtown Greenway for walking/biking', '•\tMinutes from Lake Bde Maka Ska (formerly Lake Calhoun), for swimming/canoeing/walking/biking', '•\tMinutes from YWCA and several other gyms', '•\tTransit is easy, bus stop 1/2 block to the south, or one block to the north', '•\tBryant Square Park is 1/2 block away with recently renovated kids play areas, ice skating rink', 'TERMS', '•\tRent $2,900', '•\t1 year minimum lease', "•\tDamage deposit is one month's rent", '•\tLawn care and snow removal included', '•\tFull credit and background check', '•\tPets welcome with prior approval', 'CONTACT', 'You will love this house and the location!', '  Please contact Mark using the reply button to request a showing.', ' It would be helpful to provide your cell phone number or a regular email address when you request a showing, as Craigslist messages sometimes go unnoticed in your spam folder.', 'The lease date is flexible.']
